description: Detailed analysis for a specific workload - usage patterns, resource configuration, and recommendations. Part of the Resource Consumption Analysis suite.

panels.description: Time series showing CPU consumption for the selected workload compared to request, limit, and advised values.

targets.expr:
sum(
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(pod, namespace) group_left()
  (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"}))
) * 1000

panels.title: 🔥 CPU Usage: $workload

panels.description: Time series showing memory consumption for the selected workload compared to request, limit, and advised values.
panels.title: 💾 Memory Usage: $workload

panels.description: Current CPU usage as percentage of configured request.
panels.title: CPU % of Request

panels.description: Current CPU usage as percentage of configured limit.
panels.title: CPU % of Limit

panels.description: Current memory usage as percentage of configured request.
panels.title: Memory % of Request

panels.description: Current memory usage as percentage of configured limit.
panels.title: Memory % of Limit

panels.description: Minimum CPU usage observed over the time range.

targets.expr:
sum(
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(pod, namespace) group_left()
  (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"}))
) * 1000

panels.title: CPU Min (m)

panels.description: Maximum CPU usage observed over the time range.

targets.expr:
sum(
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(pod, namespace) group_left()
  (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"}))
) * 1000

panels.title: CPU Max (m)

panels.description: Average CPU usage over the time range.

targets.expr:
sum(
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(pod, namespace) group_left()
  (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"}))
) * 1000

panels.title: CPU Avg (m)

panels.description: Minimum memory usage observed over the time range.

panels.description: Current CPU request configured in the workload.
panels.title: CPU Request (m)

panels.description: Current memory request configured in the workload.
panels.title: Mem Request (MiB)

panels.description: CPU consumption broken down by individual pod.

targets.expr:
sum by (pod) (
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(pod, namespace) group_left()
  (group by (pod, namespace, created_by_name, created_by_kind) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind=~"$workload_kinds", created_by_name=~"$workload(-[a-z0-9]{8,10}|-[0-9]+)?"}))
) * 1000

panels.title: CPU Usage per Pod

list.description: Regex pattern to filter namespace dropdown (e.g., '^1510-.*' or 'prod|staging'). Leave empty to show all namespaces.
list.label: Namespace Filter
list.name: namespace_filter

list.description: Pod owner kinds to include in workload dropdown
list.label: Workload Kinds
list.name: workload_kinds

title: Resource Consumption Analysis - Workload Details
